gw.plugin.contact.findduplicates.querybuilder

Class FieldExpression<T extends ABContact>

  • gw.plugin.contact.findduplicates.querybuilder.FieldExpression<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject

    public class FieldExpression<T extends ABContact>
implements _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject
    Represents an expression on a given field. Valid expressions are for instance: {@link EqualFieldExpression}, {@link InFieldExpression}, {@link StartsWithFieldExpression}.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Table<ABContact> Table

      • Fields inherited from class _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject

        IntrinsicType

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void collectTableNames(Map<String,List<FieldExpression<T>>> names)
      Collects all used table/join names of each FieldExpression. {@link CompositeExpression}s will also collect the children's table/join names.
      boolean isValid()
      Determines if the FieldExpression is valid and should be included in the resulting query. The default implementation in {@link AbstractFieldExpression} checks for null properties.
      void operate(ISimpleQueryBuilder<T> query)
      Operate on the given query, e.g. creating an "Equals" constraint on the query.

      • Methods inherited from class _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject

        equals, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • operate

        void operate(ISimpleQueryBuilder<T> query)
        Operate on the given query, e.g. creating an "Equals" constraint on the query.
        Parameters:
        query - The {@link ISimpleQueryBuilder} to work on

      • collectTableNames

        void collectTableNames(Map<String,List<FieldExpression<T>>> names)
        Collects all used table/join names of each FieldExpression. {@link CompositeExpression}s will also collect the children's table/join names.
        Parameters:
        names - A {@link Map} of table/join names: "PrimaryAddress" -> FieldExpression1, FieldExpression2

      • isValid

        boolean isValid()
        Determines if the FieldExpression is valid and should be included in the resulting query. The default implementation in {@link AbstractFieldExpression} checks for null properties.
        Returns:
        true: Expression is valid
